title: Roadmap

content:
Shanshan Shen | ç”³æ‰æ‰September 18th, 1998Hello, I am currently a software engineer working at Huawei Ascend, engaging in AI Infra and LLM. I have contributed to some open-source projects such as vLLM, SGLang and ChatTTS, to build a easy-to-use software ecosystem for Ascend. Before this, I was a student at Beijing Jiao Tong University (BSc/MSc), majoring in communication engineering. You can see more projects at my Github, or see my posts at CSDN and Zhihu.
Experience # Software Engineer | HuaweiJuly '23 - PresentWorking at Huawei from MetaCRM to Ascend, engaging in AI Infra and software development.
Postgraduate Student | Beijing Jiao Tong UniversitySeptember '21 - June '23Studying at School of Electronic and Information Engineering, engaging in security research of wireless communication.
Undergraduate Student | Beijing Jiao Tong UniversitySeptember '16 - June '20Studying at School of Electronic and Information Engineering, majoring in communication engineering.
Hobbies # In my spare time, I have many hobbies such as reading books, playing badminton and doing exercise. I am not only a programmer, but also a guitarist loving play both acoustic and electric guitars.
ğŸ“š Books # TODO…
ğŸ¸ Guitars # I love listening to guitar music especially fingerstyle songs and may do some recordings myself when I come across some beautiful songs. My guitars and gears used for recording are showed below, and there are also my albums that have been published so far. You can find my music at bilibili or NetEase Cloud Music.
Acoustic Guitar | Morris s101 â…¢November '18 - PresentThis is my favorite guitar which is made of Sitka Spruce (panel) and Indian Rosewood (backboard), and is equipped with pickup system of Lim magnet (passive) and Lim piezo.
Electric Guitar | Fender Telecaster PlayerMay '20 - PresentThis is my electric guitar which is made of Alderwood (body) and Maplewood (fingerboard), and is equipped with pickup system of Alnico 5 single coil.
ğŸµ Albums # Guitar Recordings | Acoustic Guitar Cover CollectionMarch '18 - January '23This album is a collection of multi-track acoustic guitar cover which contains 11 songs that I like, such as In The Rain and Crack. You can listen to these songs at here.
Guitar Recordings | Fingerstyle Guitar Cover CollectionMarch '18 - January '23This album is a collection of fingerstyle guitar and ukulele cover which contains 11 songs that I like, such as Tickets to Starry Sky and Rain stops, Good-bye. You can listen to these songs at here.
ğŸ¸ Badminton # I love playing badminton and will participate in this activity 1~4 times a week. Awards I have received are showed below. Welcome to battle with me!
Fourth place in the Inter-Department Team Competition of Xian Huawei at 2024 Second place in the Quality and Process IT Department Team Competition of Xian Huawei at 2024 Third place in the Inter-School Cup of Beijing Jiao Tong University at 2023 Contact me # Feel free to drop me an email, gmail and qq-mail are both available.
You can also have my WeChat through the picture below:
Remember to add a explaination before sending a request!
title: About me
